data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Please disregard my earlier request for Convert::FEC.

    I decided to rename it to Algorithm::FEC, for the following
    reasons:

    Convert and Algorithm being equal in "correctness", Algorithm is
    more specific (less crowded) and FEC sounds mathematically complex
    to most people.

    I do feel that Algorithm::FEC is lacking some configurabilty to be
    named Algorithm, but so far it's the only FEC module.

    Thanks in advance.

    (Maybe Digest::Hashcash should have been in Algorithm::Hashcash,
    too, but I think that's going too far, Digets::Hashcash is quite
    fine :)

    PS: the form says Algorithm is also Chapter 6 (Data Types ..). I
    think Algorithm as a whole does not belong into chapter 6 :)
